name: Stack it
description:
Stack it is a puzzle game where the objective is to stack random objects on each other. The game is currently in development and we plan to do weekly updates. Features:
  • Object stacking.
  • 35 Objects to stack.
  • 4 Environments.
  • Twitch intergration.
  • Random wind event.
  • A speed mode where you race against the camera
Planned Features:
  • More Objects, we want to keep adding as much objects as possible
  • ‘Story’ Mode
  • Daily Challenges
  • And lots more stay tuned for updates.
